JD-Xi Editor
  • jdxi_editor
  • jdxi_editor package
  • jdxi_editor.midi package

  • View page source

jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas package

Submodules

jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.digital_tone module

DigitalToneMessage

# Example usage: # Set common parameter >>> msg = DigitalToneMessage( >>> tone_type=TEMP_DIGITAL_TONE, # Digital 1 >>> section=DigitalToneSection.COMMON.value, >>> param=0x00, # Common parameter >>> value=64, >>> )

# Set partial parameter >>> msg = DigitalToneMessage( >>> tone_type=TEMP_DIGITAL_TONE, # Digital 1 >>> section=DigitalToneSection.PARTIAL_1.value, >>> param=0x00, # Partial parameter >>> value=64, >>> )

# Set modify parameter msg = DigitalToneMessage(

tone_type=TEMP_DIGITAL_TONE, # Digital 1 section=DigitalToneSection.MODIFY.value, param=0x00, # Modify parameter value=64,

)

class jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.digital_tone.DigitalToneMessage(start_of_sysex: int = 240, manufacturer_id: int = RolandID.ROLAND_ID, device_id: int = RolandID.DEVICE_ID, model_id: ~typing.List[int] = <factory>, command: int = CommandID.DT1, address: list[int] | None = None, data: list[int] | None = None, end_of_sysex: int = 247, sysex_address: ~jdxi_editor.midi.data.address.address.RolandSysExAddress | None = None, msb: int = <AddressStartMSB.TEMPORARY_TONE: 0x19>, umb: int = <AddressOffsetTemporaryToneUMB.DIGITAL_SYNTH_1: 0x01>, lmb: int = <AddressOffsetSuperNATURALLMB.PARTIAL_1: 0x20>, lsb: int = 0, value: int = 0, size: int = 1, dt1_command: int = CommandID.DT1, rq1_command: int = CommandID.RQ1)[source]

Bases: RolandSysEx

SuperNATURAL Synth Tone parameter message for JD-Xi. Defaults to TEMPORARY_TONE / Digital 1 / Common / Param 0x00

jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.system_common module

SystemCommonMessage

# Example usage: # Set master tune to +50 cents >>> msg = SystemCommonMessage( >>> param=SystemCommon.MASTER_TUNE.value, >>> value=1024 + (50 * 10), # Convert +50.0 cents to 1524 >>> )

# Set master key shift to -12 semitones >>> msg = SystemCommonMessage( >>> param=SystemCommon.MASTER_KEY_SHIFT.value, value=52 # Convert -12 to 52 (64-12) >>> )

# Set program control channel to 1 >>> msg = SystemCommonMessage( >>> param=SystemCommon.PROGRAM_CTRL_CH.value, value=1 # Channel 1 >>> )

# Enable program change reception >>> msg = SystemCommonMessage(param=SystemCommon.RX_PROGRAM_CHANGE.value, value=1) # ON

class jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.system_common.SystemCommonMessage(start_of_sysex: int = 240, manufacturer_id: int = RolandID.ROLAND_ID, device_id: int = RolandID.DEVICE_ID, model_id: ~typing.List[int] = <factory>, command: int = CommandID.DT1, address: list[int] | None = None, data: list[int] | None = None, end_of_sysex: int = 247, sysex_address: ~jdxi_editor.midi.data.address.address.RolandSysExAddress | None = None, msb: int = <AddressStartMSB.SYSTEM: 0x01>, umb: int = <AddressOffsetProgramLMB.COMMON: 0x00>, lmb: int = 0, lsb: int = 0, value: int = 0, size: int = 1, dt1_command: int = CommandID.DT1, rq1_command: int = CommandID.RQ1)[source]

jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.system_controller module

SystemControllerMessage

# Example usage: # Enable program change transmission >>> msg = SystemControllerMessage( >>> param=SystemController.TX_PROGRAM_CHANGE.value, value=1 # ON >>> )

# Set keyboard velocity to REAL >>> msg = SystemControllerMessage( >>> param=SystemController.KEYBOARD_VELOCITY.value, value=0 # REAL >>> )

# Set velocity curve to MEDIUM >>> msg = SystemControllerMessage( >>> param=SystemController.VELOCITY_CURVE.value, value=1 # MEDIUM >>> )

# Set velocity offset to +5 >>> msg = SystemControllerMessage( >>> param=SystemController.VELOCITY_OFFSET.value, value=69 # Convert +5 to 69 (64+5) >>> )

class jdxi_editor.midi.message.areas.system_controller.SystemControllerMessage(start_of_sysex: int = 240, manufacturer_id: int = RolandID.ROLAND_ID, device_id: int = RolandID.DEVICE_ID, model_id: ~typing.List[int] = <factory>, command: int = CommandID.DT1, address: list[int] | None = None, data: list[int] | None = None, end_of_sysex: int = 247, sysex_address: ~jdxi_editor.midi.data.address.address.RolandSysExAddress | None = None, msb: int = <AddressStartMSB.SETUP: 0x02>, umb: int = <AddressOffsetTemporaryToneUMB.COMMON: 0x00>, lmb: int = <AddressOffsetSystemLMB.CONTROLLER: 0x03>, lsb: int = 0, value: int = 0, size: int = 1, dt1_command: int = CommandID.DT1, rq1_command: int = CommandID.RQ1)[source]
